Class ComplexConstraint

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ComplexConstraint
public class ComplexConstraint
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the coefficients for a single constraint

Author:
Michael Bochenek (mboche01@uoguelph.ca)

relation

private int relation
flag that indicates what type of constraint this is. (one of LESS_THAN, LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO, GREATER_THAN, GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO, or EQUAL_TO)

RHS (right hand side) of constraint

num - number of coefficients
coefficients - all the coefficients stored in an array
r - flag that indicates the type of relation
c - right hand side of the constraint
